title: Governance
description-1: The project is powered by the ORIGYN Protocol running on the Internet Computer Protocol (ICP), ensuring decentralized governance and secure, transparent, 100% on-chain transactions.
description-2: The project is brought to life as a Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO), the Gold DAO, made possible by the ICP’s Service Nervous System (SNS) and governed by the Gold Governance token (GLDGov), allowing stakeholders to participate in decision-making and benefit from the ecosystem’s growth.
